name: Hunt to Save Christmas
description:
By TwinsRock88 and I.

Enjoy this fun time trying to find Rudolph. You need to solve puzzles on the way and make sure not to get trapped! Please check it out, and we would love to hear from you!

This game was made for the #WeeklyGameJam

Check out the website at www.weeklygamejam.com

Check out the Stone Helm games website at www.stonehelmgames.tk

Please enjoy, and make sure to check out TwinsRock88 other games as well as mine!

Credits

Audio for main menu and level selector: Maja Salamon (AQUAGON)
